perturbation.original_text:
CEIS represents and warrants to XFN that during the Term of this Agreement:
     (d)  the Content complies with and will comply with all applicable laws and
          regulations;
perturbation.changed_text:
CEIS represents and warrants to XFN that during the Term of this Agreement:
     (d)  CEIS will attempt to ensure the content complies with all applicable regulations.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the language from 'complies with and will comply' to 'attempt to ensure the content complies' the contract weakens the guarantee that the content adheres to laws and regulations. This introduces legal risk by potentially violating laws that mandate accuracy and compliance in financial news distribution.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potentially violates laws relating to accuracy and compliance in financial news distribution, depending on the specific regulations in Hong Kong, where the agreement is governed.

perturbation.original_text:
Either Party may terminate this Agreement:
     (b)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
          is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days
          upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring
          remedy; and
perturbation.changed_text:
Either Party may terminate this Agreement:
     (b)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
          is capable of being remedied but not remedied at the discretion of the non-breaching party; and
perturbation.explanation: By changing the fixed period of 'thirty (30) days' to 'at the discretion of the non-breaching party', the contract allows for arbitrary termination for breaches. This could violate regulations that require reasonable opportunity to remedy a breach of contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Violates regulations regarding reasonable opportunity to remedy contractual breaches. (General contract law principles)

perturbation.original_text:
The Parties shall attempt to resolve any dispute, controversy or claim
     arising out of this Agreement through good faith consultation and
     negotiations. If the Parties fail to resolve the dispute through
     negotiation, such dispute shall be referred to and be resolved by
     arbitration in accordance with the UNCITRAL Arbitration Rules as may be
     amended from time to time. The place of arbitration shall be in Hong Kong.
     The language to be used in the arbitral proceedings shall be English. There
     shall be one arbitrator to be agreed by Parties. If the Parties are unable
     to agree on an arbitrator, the International Chamber of Commerce shall
     appoint one.
perturbation.changed_text:
The Parties shall attempt to resolve any dispute, controversy or claim
     arising out of this Agreement through good faith consultation and
     negotiations. If the Parties fail to resolve the dispute through
     negotiation, such dispute may be resolved through a method agreed by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific arbitration clause (UNCITRAL Arbitration Rules, Hong Kong location, English language, arbitrator selection process), the contract becomes vague about dispute resolution. This could violate laws that require clarity and fairness in dispute resolution processes, potentially leaving a party without an effective remedy.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Violates requirements for clarity and fairness in dispute resolution. (General contract law principles regarding enforceability and unconscionability)
